description.value: An extension to provide the amount of the product in the medication agreement, administration agreement or variable-dosing regimen on which this administration is based.

purpose.value: This extension represents the AgreedAmount concept for implementations following the information standard [MP9](https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/Landingspagina_Medicatieproces).

definition.value: The amount of the product in the medication agreement, administration agreement or variable-dosing regimen on which this administration is based. Because multiple dosages can be recorded in one medication agreement/admininistration agreement/variable-dosing regimen, for example the administered dosage can differ from the agreed amount.
